SelectionAreaType.DatabaseJoinQuery: INNER JOIN DimTaajama A2 ON (A2.Alue_ID = A.Taajama_Alue_ID AND A2.Jakso_ID BETWEEN A.Alkaen_Jakso_ID AND A.Asti_Jakso_ID)
SelectionAreaType.DatabaseListQuery: SELECT {0} A2.Alue_ID AS AreaId, A2.Nimi AS AreaName, NULL AS AlternativeId, NULL AS Year FROM DimTaajama A2 {1} WHERE 1=1 {2}

SelectionAreaType.DatabaseJoinQuery: INNER JOIN DimAsutusAlueTyyppi A2 ON A2.Asutusaluetyyppi_ID = A.AsutusalueTyyppi_ID
SelectionAreaType.DatabaseListQuery: SELECT {0} A2.AsutusalueTyyppi_ID AS AreaId, A2.AsutusalueTyyppiSelite AS AreaName, NULL AS AlternativeId, NULL AS Year FROM DimAsutusalueTyyppi A2 {1} WHERE 1=1 {2}

SelectionAreaType.DatabaseJoinQuery: INNER JOIN DimKaupunkiseutu A2 ON (A2.Alue_ID = A.Kaupunkiseutu_Alue_ID AND (A2.Jakso_ID BETWEEN A.Alkaen_Jakso_ID AND A.Asti_Jakso_ID))
SelectionAreaType.DatabaseListQuery: SELECT {0} A2.Alue_ID AS AreaId, A2.KseutuNimi AS AreaName, A2.KseutuNro AS AlternativeId, A2.Jakso_ID AS Year FROM DimKaupunkiseutu A2 {1} WHERE 1=1 {2}

SelectionAreaType.DatabaseJoinQuery: INNER JOIN DimKunta A2 ON A2.Alue_ID = A.Kunta_Alue_ID
SelectionAreaType.DatabaseListQuery: SELECT {0} A2.Alue_ID AS AreaId, A2.Nimi AS AreaName, NULL AS AlternativeId, NULL AS Year FROM DimKunta A2 {1} WHERE 1=1 {2}

SelectionAreaType.DatabaseJoinQuery: INNER JOIN DimSeutukunta A2 ON A2.Alue_ID = A.Seutukunta_Alue_ID
SelectionAreaType.DatabaseListQuery: SELECT {0} A2.Alue_ID AS AreaId, A2.Nimi AS AreaName, A2.Nro AS AlternativeId, NULL AS Year FROM DimSeutukunta A2 {1} WHERE 1=1 {2}

SelectionAreaType.DatabaseJoinQuery: INNER JOIN DimMaakunta A2 ON A2.Alue_ID = A.Maakunta_Alue_ID
SelectionAreaType.DatabaseListQuery: SELECT {0} A2.Alue_ID AS AreaId, A2.Nimi AS AreaName, A2.Nro AS AlternativeId, NULL AS Year FROM DimMaakunta A2 {1} WHERE 1=1 {2}

SelectionAreaType.DatabaseJoinQuery: INNER JOIN DimEly A2 ON A2.Alue_ID = A.ELY_E_Alue_ID
SelectionAreaType.DatabaseListQuery: SELECT {0} A2.Alue_ID AS AreaId, A2.Nimi AS AreaName, A2.Nro AS AlternativeId, NULL AS Year FROM DimELY A2 {1} WHERE 1=1 {2}

SelectionAreaType.DatabaseJoinQuery: INNER JOIN DimEly A2 ON A2.Alue_ID = A.ELY_L_Alue_ID
SelectionAreaType.DatabaseListQuery: SELECT {0} A2.Alue_ID AS AreaId, COALESCE(A2.LiikenneElyNimi, A2.Nimi) AS AreaName, A2.Nro AS AlternativeId, NULL AS Year FROM DimELY A2 {1} WHERE 1=1 {2}

SelectionAreaType.DatabaseJoinQuery: INNER JOIN DimEly A2 ON A2.Alue_ID = A.ELY_Y_Alue_ID
SelectionAreaType.DatabaseListQuery: SELECT {0} A2.Alue_ID AS AreaId, COALESCE(A2.YmparistoElyNimi, A2.Nimi) AS AreaName, A2.Nro AS AlternativeId, NULL AS Year FROM DimELY A2 {1} WHERE 1=1 {2}
SELECT {0} -1 AS AreaId, 'Suomi' AS AreaName, NULL AS AlternativeId, NULL AS Year

SelectionAreaType.DatabaseJoinQuery: INNER JOIN DimAsemakaavoitettuAlue A2 ON (A2.Alue_ID = A.AsemakaavoitettuAlue_Alue_ID AND A2.Jakso_ID BETWEEN A.Alkaen_Jakso_ID AND A.Asti_Jakso_ID)
SelectionAreaType.DatabaseListQuery: SELECT {0} A2.Alue_ID AS AreaId, A2.KaavaNro AS AreaName, A2.KaavaNro AS AlternativeId, A2.Jakso_ID AS Year FROM DimAsemakaavoitettuAlue A2 {1} WHERE 1=1 {2}

SelectionAreaType.DatabaseJoinQuery: INNER JOIN DimAsutusalueTyyppi A2 ON A2.Asutusaluetyyppi_ID = A.AsutusalueTyyppi_ID
SelectionAreaType.DatabaseListQuery: SELECT {0} A2.Asutusaluetyyppi_ID AS AreaId, A2.AsutusalueTyyppiSelite AS AreaName, NULL AS AlternativeId, NULL AS Year FROM DimAsutusalueTyyppi A2 {1} WHERE 1=1 {2}

SelectionAreaType.DatabaseJoinQuery: INNER JOIN DimHallintoOikeus A2 ON A2.Alue_ID = A.HallintoOikeus_Alue_ID
SelectionAreaType.DatabaseListQuery: SELECT {0} A2.Alue_ID AS AreaId, A2.Nimi AS AreaName, NULL AS AlternativeId, NULL AS Year FROM DimHallintoOikeus A2 {1} WHERE 1=1 {2}

SelectionAreaType.DatabaseJoinQuery: INNER JOIN DimKaupanAlue A2 ON A2.Alue_ID = A.KaupanAlue_ID INNER JOIN DimKeskustatyyppi KT ON KT.Keskustatyyppi_ID = A2.KeskustaTyyppi_ID
SelectionAreaType.DatabaseListQuery: SELECT {0} A2.Alue_ID AS AreaId, (KT.Selite + ' (' + CONVERT(varchar(max), A2.Alue_ID) + ')') AS AreaName, NULL AS AlternativeId, A2.Jakso_ID AS Year FROM DimKaupanAlue A2 INNER JOIN DimKeskustatyyppi KT ON KT.Keskustatyyppi_ID = A2.Keskustatyyppi_ID {1} WHERE 1=1 {2}

SelectionAreaType.DatabaseJoinQuery: INNER JOIN DimKaupunkiMaaseutuTyyppi A2 ON A2.Kaupunkimaaseutu_Tyyppi_ID = A.KaupunkiMaaseutuTyyppi_ID
SelectionAreaType.DatabaseListQuery: SELECT {0} A2.KaupunkimaaseutuTyyppi_ID AS AreaId, A2.Selite AS AreaName, NULL AS AlternativeId, NULL AS Year FROM DimKaupunkiMaaseutuTyyppi A2 {1} WHERE 1=1 {2}

SelectionAreaType.DatabaseJoinQuery: INNER JOIN DimKaupunkiseutuTyyppi A2 ON A2.KaupunkiseutuTyyppi_ID = A.KaupunkiseutuTyyppi_ID
SelectionAreaType.DatabaseListQuery: SELECT {0} A2.KaupunkiseutuTyyppi_ID AS AreaId, A2.Selite AS AreaName, NULL AS AlternativeId, NULL AS Year FROM DimKaupunkiseutuTyyppi A2 {1} WHERE 1=1 {2}

SelectionAreaType.DatabaseJoinQuery: INNER JOIN DimKeskusta A2 ON (A2.Alue_ID = A.Keskusta_Alue_ID AND (A2.Jakso_ID BETWEEN A.Alkaen_Jakso_ID AND A.Asti_Jakso_ID))
SelectionAreaType.DatabaseListQuery: SELECT {0} A2.Alue_ID AS AreaId, A2.KeskustaNimi AS AreaName, NULL AS AlternativeId, A2.Jakso_ID AS Year FROM DimKeskusta A2 {1} WHERE 1=1 {2}

SelectionAreaType.DatabaseJoinQuery: INNER JOIN DimKeskustatyyppi A2 ON A2.Keskustatyyppi_ID = A.KeskustaTyyppi_ID
SelectionAreaType.DatabaseListQuery: SELECT {0} A2.Keskustatyyppi_ID AS AreaId, A2.Selite AS AreaName, NULL AS AlternativeId, NULL AS Year FROM DimKeskustatyyppi A2 {1} WHERE 1=1 {2}

SelectionAreaType.DatabaseJoinQuery: INNER JOIN DimTaajamaHarvaTiheaTyyppi A2 ON A2.TaajamaHarvaTiheaTyyppi_ID = A.TaajamaHarvaTiheaTyyppi_ID
SelectionAreaType.DatabaseListQuery: SELECT {0} A2.TaajamaHarvaTiheaTyyppi_ID AS AreaId, A2.Selite AS AreaName, NULL AS AlternativeId, NULL AS Year FROM DimTaajamaHarvaTiheaTyyppi A2 {1} WHERE 1=1 {2}
